 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצֹם‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 31</sup>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצַם‎</span> **verb** ==be vast, mighty, numerous== (Late Hebrew Nithp. ***contend strenuously***, and in derivatives; Phoenician in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצמת‎</span> ***mighty deeds***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצמם‎</span> ***bones***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be great*** in bone, or anything, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***bones***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִטְמָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thigh***): — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָצַם‎</span> consecutive [[Dan.8.24|Dan 8:24]]; [[Dan.11.23|Dan 11:23]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצַמְתָּ‎</span> [[Gen.26.16|Gen 26:16]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽצְמוּ‎</span> [[Isa.31.1|Isa 31:1]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצֵ֑מוּ‎</span> [[Ps.38.20|Ps 38:20]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעַצְמוּ‎</span> [[Exod.1.7|Exod 1:7]]; [[Exod.1.20|Exod 1:20]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצְמַת‎</span> [[Isa.47.9|Isa 47:9]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצְמוֺ‎</span> [[Dan.8.8|Dan 8:8]] — 

**1.** ***be mighty***, [[Gen.26.16|Gen 26:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare), [[Dan.8.8|Dan 8:8]]; [[Dan.8.24|Dan 8:24]]; [[Dan.11.23|Dan 11:23]]. 

**2.** ***be numerous***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַבּוּ‎</span> etc., [[Isa.31.1|Isa 31:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעָצְמַת חֲבָרַיִח מְאֹד‎</span> [[Isa.47.9|Isa 47:9]], [[Jer.5.6|Jer 5:6]]; [[Jer.30.14|Jer 30:14]]; [[Jer.30.15|Jer 30:15]]; [[Exod.1.7|Exod 1:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), v[[Exod.1.20|Exod 1:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Ps.38.20|Ps 38:20]]; [[Ps.69.5|Ps 69:5]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare [[Jer.15.8|Jer 15:8]]; [[Ps.40.6|Ps 40:6]]; [[Ps.40.13|Ps 40:13]] alone [[Ps.139.17|Ps 139:17]]. **Hiph\`il** ***make strong, Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular: suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעֲצִימֵחוּ‎</span> [[Ps.105.24|Ps 105:24]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare 



<small>Also see: [[H6095]]</small>

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצַם‎</span>] **verb** ==shut the eyes== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il; possibly connection with Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = ***id.***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, IV (on <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxii (1878), 406</sup>); Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמֵּץ‎</span> ***close eyes*** of dead; compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 5f.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעֹצֵם עֵינָיו מִן‎</span> [[Isa.33.15|Isa 33:15]] ***shutteth his eyes from seeing*** **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְעַצֵּם אֶתעֵֿינֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Isa.29.10|Isa 29:10]] ***he hath tightly shut your eyes*** (compare I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצה‎</span>).
